answer: In our competitive society, many people believe that only the biggest or the strongest can survive and thrive
However, I propose an alternative view: kindness is the key to success
We can use the power of our natural kindness to communicate and cooperate with different individuals
We can all benefit from this instead of trying to be better than others.
I’d like to end this talk with a message.
Think of our society as a bouquet.
Just as each flower adds to the beauty when it harmonizes with the others, each person can contribute to a more beautiful world when they cooperate.
By being kind and working together, we can truly flourish. Thank you for your attention.
